content: A kitten has just slipped and fallen into a pond. All these geese are going nuts - flapping, honking, and making the poor little cat's panic fifty times worse than it already is. Suddenly, a big dog - maybe a Chocolate Lab? - Jumps into the water and paddles over, trying to grab the kitten by the scruff of the neck. It's a matter of life and death. The kitten is struggling, about to go under.
author: Gordon Korman
